Title: Relates to imposing a nursing home purchase moratorium on those who own or have owned failing facilities
Summary: Imposes a nursing home purchase moratorium on those who own or have owned failing facilities for twenty-four months since their last violation.
LawCode: Add ยง2808-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to imposing a nursing home purchase moratorium on those who own or have owned failing facilities
